title: 42: OBITCH gorgeous gorgeous girls self-mummify...
description:
This week the gruesome twosome are bringing you everything from self-mummification to some deadly fashion faux pas. We’ve got an obituary for a little superhero, an icon, and survivor, and of course we’ve got some real dumbasses to finish things off! 
Follow along online: @obitchuarypod on Twitter & Instagram. 
Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com
Spencer Henry & Madison Reyes PO Box 18149 Long Beach, CA 90807
Get a cameo from us: https://www.cameo.com/obitchuarypodcast
Sponsors: 
FitOn: Text OBITS to 64-000 to join over 10 million people getting their FitOn! 
Workable: Go to workable.com to start hiring today with a risk-free 15 day trial! 
Daily Harvest: DailyHarvest.com/obit for up to $40 off your first box!

Sources:
https://www.grunge.com/317695/the-spiritual-practice-of-self-mummification/ https://listverse.com/2016/03/24/10-facts-you-should-know-about-self-mummification/ https://gizmodo.com/the-gruesome-and-excruciating-practice-of-mummifying-yo-1515905564 https://allthatsinteresting.com/sokushinbutsu https://www.ranker.com/list/facts-about-sokushinbutsu-japanese-self-mummification-monks/amber-fua https://www.historicmysteries.com/japanese-mummy/ https://www.atlasobscura.com/articles/sokushinbutsu https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QsM7jjmka7Q&t=957s https://people.com/music/ed-sheeran-icelandic-obituary-82-year-old-man/ https://allthatsinteresting.com/luang-pho-daeng-mummy https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cp8jFpBuFu8 https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/desmoinesregister/name/garrett-matthias-obituary?id=13428220 https://people.com/human-interest/boy-dying-of-cancer-prepares-own-obituary/ https://www.huffpost.com/entry/toni-jo-silvey-called-ex-boyfriend-1000-times_n_1009214 https://nypost.com/2015/10/17/the-crazy-ways-your-clothes-can-kill-you/ https://www.buzzfeed.com/juliegerstein/9-times-people-literally-died-for-fashion https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hobble_skirt https://www.nationalgeographic.com/culture/article/dress-hat-fashion-clothing-mercury-arsenic-poison-history See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
